activation.ReallyYourEmail: Iyi ndiyo email kero yako here, {{1}}? Kana zvirizvo, tinya apa kuti uise chirevo chako uye uvhure account yako.

LinkToUnsubscribe: Heino chinongedzo chekubvisa kana iwe usingade kuwana mamwe maemail.

charge.HasBeenCharged: Hei, izvi ndezvekukuzivisai kuti {{1}} yabhadhariswa {{2}} ye{1001}} na{1002}}

charged.HavePaid: Nhai {{1}}, ichi chingori chitsidzo chekukurumidza kuti wabhadhara {{2}} ku{1001}} ye{{4}}

resend.YouAreReceiving: Uri kugamuchira iyi email nekuti mumwe munhu aisa email kero yako ndokudzvanya "forgot passphrase". Dai wanga usiri iwe, ingofuratira meseji iyi.
resend.Reset: Kuti uise patsva izwi rako, baya {{1}}

subscription.YouHaveStarted: Nhai {{1}}, watanga kuzvinyoresa ku {{2}} ne {{3}} pa {{4}} kwe{{5}} mwedzi.
subscription.HasStarted: Izvi ndezvekungokuzivisai {{1}}, vatanga kuzvinyoresa kwavo ku{{2}} ne{1001}} pa{1002}} kwe{{5}} mwedzi.
